mods.abstract:
This is a dataset of 285 train and metro (S, U, S+U) stops in Berlin. The data is described in terms of their geocoordinates (`geodata.csv`) and in terms of their pairwise travel time in minutes (`D.csv`) using public transportation according to the [schedule of the VBB Verkehrsverbund Berlin-Brandenburg GmbH](https://daten.berlin.de/datensaetze/vbb-fahrplandaten-august-2017-bis-dezember-2017) (August 2017 to Dezember 2017). Possible use cases for this data set include distance-based clustering, distance-based classification, and graph-theoretic analysis.
If you wish to use this data set in academic work, please cite it according to its DOI (doi:[10.4119/unibi/2916863](http://doi.org/10.4119/unibi/2916863)). If you have any further question, please contact the [corresponding author](mailto:bpaassen@techfak.uni-bielefeld.de).
